definition: as matters stand/things having reached this stage

sentences.english: It's much easier to go abroad than before.
sentences.chinese: 如今出国比以前超卓多了。

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，这已成为迄今为止最成功的英国独立电影。

sentences.english: The use of radiation sources in medical and other applications is widespread throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今世界各地普遍在医疗和其它应用中使用放射源。

sentences.english: "Never say never" is one of my new expressions.
sentences.chinese: 如今，“决不说‘决不’”成了我新的口头禅之一。

sentences.english: But now it seems Indians, too, are getting less worked up about dalliances.
sentences.chinese: 如今似乎印度人也对放荡不那么激动了。

sentences.english: The result is a universe that now looks like a sponge.
sentences.chinese: 结果是如今的宇宙看上去就像一块海绵。

sentences.english: Huangyuan now ranked in the traditional lamp based on skills and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 如今的湟源排灯在传统技艺的基础上又有了创新。

sentences.english: The Dove range now covers skin creams, shampoos and shower gels .
sentences.chinese: 多芬品牌如今包括护肤霜，洗发水和沐浴露。

sentences.english: They had no time now for neighborhood gossip.
sentences.chinese: 如今，他们没有时间和周围的人闲扯。

sentences.english: Heir to an industrial past, the region has turned towards tourism.
sentences.chinese: 曾经工业的继承者，而如今这里已转向旅游业。

sentences.english: Today this is known as a ★ steelyard scale 13 .
sentences.chinese: 如今这种天平被称作“杆秤”。

sentences.english: Some of Guling's older villas have now been redesignated as museums or shrines.
sentences.chinese: 牯岭的一些老别墅如今被重新设计成博物馆或神殿。

sentences.english: This event had at last been despaired of, but it was then too late to be saving.
sentences.chinese: 这个指望落了空，如今省吃俭用已经太迟了。

sentences.english: Weston now demanded all profits from these sales go entirely to the investors.
sentences.chinese: 威斯顿如今却要求所有销售的利润均归投资者。

sentences.english: Many libraries and archives now have historical digital image collections available.
sentences.chinese: 如今，许多图书馆图书馆提供历史数字图像资料。

sentences.english: The Kansas City broadband plan is well advanced.
sentences.chinese: 堪萨斯城宽频项目如今进展顺利。

definition: things change with the passage of time (idiom)
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
the last few years/last several years/recent years
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
